experience: You and Heather both know Glen Chamberlain, Jason Pierse, and 34 others

I had a great time meeting with three of our Management Development Program participants from our Palo Alto community.  What an inspiring group of professionals.  Times haven't changed that much!   We spent a lot of time talking about their career aspirations and their number one challenge.. comfort in presenting in front of others! I remember that fear well...way back to my early career at United Airlines. Spending time with these colleagues was truly one of the highlights of my time at our community!
